00097 // check type sizes
00098 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::int8) == 1, "int8 size isn't 1 byte on this platform");
00099 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::int16) == 2, "int16 size isn't 2 bytes on this platform");
00100 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::int32) == 4, "int32 size isn't 4 bytes on this platform");
00101 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::int64) == 8, "int64 size isn't 8 bytes on this platform");
00102 
00103 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::uint8) == 1, "uint8 size isn't 1 byte on this platform");
00104 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::uint16) == 2, "uint16 size isn't 2 bytes on this platform");
00105 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::uint32) == 4, "uint32 size isn't 4 bytes on this platform");
00106 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::uint64) == 8, "uint64 size isn't 8 bytes on this platform");
00107 
00108 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::float16) == 2, "float16 size isn't 2 bytes on this platform");
00109 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::float32) == 4, "float32 size isn't 4 bytes on this platform");
00110 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(glm::detail::float64) == 8, "float64 size isn't 8 bytes on this platform");
